document.comment: Generated automatically from Godot engine sources.

section.title: Description
section.paragraph: A hand tracking system will create an instance of this object and add it to the XRServer. This tracking system will then obtain skeleton data, convert it to the Godot Humanoid hand skeleton and store this data on the XRHandTracker object.
Use XRHandModifier3D to animate a hand mesh using hand tracking data.

section.title: Enumerations
section.paragraph: The source of hand tracking data is unknown.
The source of hand tracking data is unobstructed, meaning that an accurate method of hand tracking is used. These include optical hand tracking, data gloves, etc.
The source of hand tracking data is a controller, meaning that joint positions are inferred from controller inputs.
No hand tracking data is tracked, this either means the hand is obscured, the controller is turned off, or tracking is not supported for the current input type.
Represents the size of the HandTrackingSource enum.
Represents the size of the HandJoint enum.
The hand joint's orientation data is valid.
The hand joint's orientation is actively tracked. May not be set if tracking has been temporarily lost.
The hand joint's position data is valid.
The hand joint's position is actively tracked. May not be set if tracking has been temporarily lost.
The hand joint's linear velocity data is valid.
The hand joint's angular velocity data is valid.

section.title: Property Descriptions
section.paragraph: The source of the hand tracking data.
If true, the hand tracking data is valid.

section.title: Method Descriptions
section.paragraph: Returns the angular velocity for the given hand joint.
Returns flags about the validity of the tracking data for the given hand joint.
Returns the linear velocity for the given hand joint.
Returns the radius of the given hand joint.
Returns the transform for the given hand joint.

Sets flags about the validity of the tracking data for the given hand joint.
void set_hand_joint_linear_velocity(joint: HandJoint, linear_velocity: Vector3) ðŸ”—
Sets the linear velocity for the given hand joint.
void set_hand_joint_radius(joint: HandJoint, radius: float) ðŸ”—
Sets the radius of the given hand joint.
void set_hand_joint_transform(joint: HandJoint, transform: Transform3D) ðŸ”—
Sets the transform for the given hand joint.
